row.process: ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! variables ! &KISS_HOSTNAME# ! ! referentiel VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS ! :SET &MY_IP#="0.0.0.0" :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,"USER") :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,"PASSWORD") :SET &MY_DNSSERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,"DNSSERVER") :SET &MY_ZONENAME#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.WINDNS,"ZONENAME") :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string set RC="KO" echo dnscmd &MY_DNSSERVER# /RecordAdd &MY_ZONENAME# &KISS_HOSTNAME# RecordType &MY_IP# if "%ERRORLEVEL%" == "0" SET RC="OK" :REGISTER_VARIABLE MY_RC#,%RC%

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: RESERVATION IP WINDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME# !: PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,RESERVATION IP WINDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="RESERVATION IP WINDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: RESERVATION IP WINDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,RESERVATION IP WINDNS &KISS_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
